Detailed Description

The AbstractMapTile class is a derivative of AbstractMapItem and a baseclass for all passable floortiles.

Member Function Documentation

bool AbstractMapTile::isCollectible (  )  const [virtual]

checks if derivative of AbstractMapTile is collectible

Returns:
true if collectible, else returns false. Returns false, since AbstractMapTiles are never collectible

Implements AbstractMapItem.

Reimplemented in AbstractCollectibleItem.

bool AbstractMapTile::isPassable (  )  const [virtual]

checks if floortile is passable

Returns:
true if passable, else returns false. Returns true, since AbstractMapTiles are always passable

Implements AbstractMapItem.

Reimplemented in AbstractCollectibleItem.

virtual bool AbstractMapTile::onEntered (  )  const [pure virtual]

is called when entered by player

Returns:
true if entered, else return false

Implemented in AbstractCollectibleItem, Gold, and FloorTile.
